sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { auctionDetailReducer } from '../reducers/auctionReducers' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, Button, Card, ListGroup, Form, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import AuctionService from '../services/AuctionService' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { STATUS, TYPE, getKeyByValue } from '../constants/auctionConstants' function AuctionDetailScreen({match, history}) { let socket = new WebSocket('ws://localhost:8000/ws/auction/') socket.onmessage = (event) => { let data = JSON.parse(event.data); console.log(data); } const auctionService = new AuctionService() const [price, setPrice] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch() const auctionDetail = useSelector(state => state.auctionDetail) const {loading, auction, error} = auctionDetail useEffect(() => { dispatch(auctionService.getAuctionDetail(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const makeOfferHandler = () => { console.log('Making offer') } return (
{loading ? : error ? {error} : (

Type: {getKeyByValue(TYPE, auction.type)}

Status: {getKeyByValue(STATUS, auction.auction_status)}

Start price: ${auction.start_price}

Current offer: ${auction.end_price}

Min price step: ${auction.price_step}

Starting date: {auction.opening_date}

Closing date: {auction.closing_date}

 Your offer: setPrice(e.target.value)} >
)}
) } export default AuctionDetailScreen
